toc.text: openSUSE Leap 15.2 或更新版本使用方法

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["openSUSE 项目是一个由 Novell 赞助的社区项目。该项目旨在推进 Linux 的广泛应用，提供自由、易于入手和美观实用的 openSUSE Linux 发行版。openSUSE 使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"zypper"}]," 作为包管理器。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["openSUSE 默认使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://zh.opensuse.org/MirrorBrain","rel":"nofollow","children":"MirrorBrain"}]," 技术统一镜像入口，通过在下载时自动分配镜像站点，从而给用户提供更好的安全性，通常情况下使用默认配置即可。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"由于使用 MirrorBrain 需要从位于德国的 openSUSE 主服务器上获取元信息，所以若在使用默认软件源时获取元信息较慢，可以使用镜像软件源替换默认软件源。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"opensuse-leap-152-或更新版本使用方法","children":"openSUSE Leap 15.2 或更新版本使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"禁用官方软件源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper mr -da","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"添加镜像源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distribution/leap/$releasever/repo/oss/' mirror-oss
{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distribution/leap/$releasever/repo/non-oss/' mirror-non-oss
{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/update/leap/$releasever/oss/' mirror-update
{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/update/leap/$releasever/non-oss/' mirror-update-non-oss","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Leap 15.3 用户还需添加 sle 和 backports 源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/update/leap/$releasever/sle/' mirror-sle-update
{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/update/leap/$releasever/backports/' mirror-backports-update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Leap 15.3 注：若在安装时",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"没有"}],"启用在线软件源，sle 源和 backports 源将在系统首次更新后引入，请确保系统在更新后仅启用了",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"六个"}],"所需软件源。可使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"zypper lr"}]," 检查软件源状态，并使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"zypper mr -d"}]," 禁用多余的软件源。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"opensuse-tumbleweed-使用方法","children":"openSUSE Tumbleweed 使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"禁用官方软件源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper mr -da","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"添加镜像源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/tumbleweed/repo/oss/' mirror-oss
{{sudo}}zypper ar -cfg '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/tumbleweed/repo/non-oss/' mirror-non-oss","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"刷新软件源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}zypper ref","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Tumbleweed 注：Tumbleweed 安装后默认会启用 oss, non-oss, update, 3 个官方软件源，
其中 oss 及 non-oss 源用于发布 Tumbleweed 的每日构建快照，快照中已包含系统所需的全部软件包及更新。
update 源仅用于推送临时安全补丁，如当日快照已发布但仍有临时安全补丁时，会首先推送至 update 源，并在次日合入下一版快照。
由于 update 源存在较强的时效性，上游镜像并未同步 update 源，镜像源亦无法提供该源的镜像。
禁用 update 源并不会使系统缺失任何功能或安全更新，仅会导致极少数更新晚些推送，如有需求可以重新启用官方 update 源。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"图形界面下配置方法","children":"图形界面下配置方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以 openSUSE Leap 15.3 为例："}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"打开 YaST；"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"点击 Software 分组中的 Software Repositories；"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在打开的窗口上方的列表中点击 Main Repository，点击 Edit；"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将 download.opensuse.org 替换为"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"点 OK；"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再用同样的方法编辑 Non-OSS Repository, Main Update Repository, Update Repository (Non-Oss) 和 Update repository with updates from SUSE Linux Enterprise 15。"}],"
"]}],"
"]}]]}]
